nodes.text: 2J-3PO was a protocol droid that was active during the Clone Wars on Tatooine and acted as a courier for the Vosadii.

At one point, the droid was carrying a message from the Hutt Clan Vosadii to Jabba when the convoy was attacked by Tusken Raiders. After two days of wandering the desert, the droid encounters a group of agents and offers to split the reward for their help. They must then recover the message.
2J-3PO appears in a Modular Encounter in Fantasy Flight Games' 2019 roleplaying game sourcebook Rise of the Separatists.
